Detailed Description

general routines for Stock construction, destruction, and maintenance.

Function Documentation

StockT* construct_stock ( char *  name  ) 

allocate and return a stock with the requested name.

makes a copy of the name pointer. returns 0 on failure.

Variable Documentation

StockT stock_defaults

Default values for StockT.

These disable as many features as possible and when an input file is written out, only values that differ from these defaults are written out. Thus, old parameters that are generally disabled are hidden.

struct stock_info stocks

construct a new stock of the requested name and insert it into the global list.

return 0 on error, new number of stocks on success.
